miniapp.name: Memory Match BASE
miniapp.subtitle: Test your memory with BASE projects
miniapp.description: Classic memory card game featuring BASE blockchain ecosystem projects. Match pairs, complete 100 levels, and master the BASE ecosystem! Play now and save your progress on-chain with gas-free transactions.
miniapp.tagline: Master the BASE ecosystem through memory!
miniapp.ogTitle: Memory Match BASE - Blockchain Memory Game
miniapp.ogDescription: Test your memory with BASE blockchain projects. 100 levels of crypto fun!
